querystring.select: SELECT re1.EMP_NAME AS SalesOfficerNo, a.SALES_NOTES AS SalesNotes, re2.EMP_NAME AS SalesHeadNo, MC.DESCR AS SalesRecommendCode
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP a WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER MC WITH(NOLOCK)  ON a.MR_SALES_RECOMMEND_CODE = MC.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_EMP re1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.SALES_OFFICER_NO = re1.EMP_NO JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_EMP re2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.SALES_HEAD_NO = re2.EMP_NO

querystring.select: SELECT RAS.APP_SRC_NAME AS AppSourceCode, RM3.DESCR AS FirstInstTypeCode, a.TENOR AS Tenor, RM5.DESCR AS InterestType, RM1.DESCR AS PayFreqCode, a.NUM_OF_INST AS NumOfInst, RM2.DESCR AS InstSchemeCode, a.MR_CUST_NOTIFY_OPT_CODE AS CustNotifyOptCode, RM4.DESCR AS WopCode, a.FLOATING_PERIOD_CODE AS FloatingPeriodCode
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP a WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.APP_FIN_DATA afd WITH(NOLOCK) on a.APP_ID = afd.APP_ID JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.PAY_FREQ_CODE = RM1.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON afd.MR_INST_SCHEME_CODE = RM2.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.MR_FIRST_INST_TYPE_CODE = RM3.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM4 WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.MR_WOP_CODE = RM4.MASTER_CODE JOIN FOUNDATION.dbo.REF_MASTER RM5 WITH(NOLOCK) ON afd.INTEREST_TYPE = RM5.MASTER_CODE JOIN dbo.REF_APP_SRC RAS WITH (NOLOCK) ON a.MR_APP_SOURCE_CODE = RAS.APP_SRC_CODE
querystring.where: WHERE a.APP_ID = {0} AND RM4.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'WOP' AND RM5.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INTEREST_INPUT_TYPE'
